title: Simplify layout styles to Tailwind
description: Reduce custom CSS, rely on Tailwind classes/arbitrary values; keep gradients via inline classes; leave minimal CSS utilities.
notes: Aligned navbar title font with Tailwind arbitrary class font-[var(--font-display)] (no inline style).

title: Extract neon panel UI component
description: Create reusable panel UI shell (header, badge, meta) and use it in app layout.
notes: Added reusable Panel component (label/badge/meta inputs) with neon glass styling; app shell now uses it for routed content.

title: Refresh app layout to neon panel
description: Align app shell with arcade-inspired mock: gradient background, header, single glass panel for routed content.
notes: Updated app shell to neon-inspired layout with gradient background, illuminated header, and single glass panel wrapping routed content.

title: Add env-driven API config loader
description: Add .env entry for API base URL (default localhost:8080) and implement a single configuration class/service that reads, validates, and exposes config. Include typing, sensible defaults, validation errors with clear messaging, and documentation for local/production usage.

title: Update AGENTS.md and README with helpful future notes
Add VT323 display font
description: Add Google VT323 in Tailwind-friendly way and apply to nav title only.
notes: Imported Google VT323 font in styles via Tailwind base layer and applied to navbar title; documented Tailwind token usage in README.

title: Add pre-commit hook for prettier and eslint
description: Ensure lint and formatting run on commit.
notes: Added npm format:check and lint steps to pre-commit hook (SKIP_PRECOMMIT_LINT to bypass) and documented in README.

title: Add formatting/linting defaults (Prettier + ESLint)
description: Goal: establish repo-wide Prettier/ESLint setup aligned with Angular v21. Plan: 1) Inspect current toolchain and configs. 2) Add ESLint + Prettier config (deps, lint target, scripts) consistent with repo conventions. 3) Document how to run lint/format and ensure config enforces key Angular/TypeScript guidance.

title: Refactor navbar into UI components
description: Restore Albums link and extract header/nav and nav links into reusable UI components.
notes: Restored Albums nav item and extracted navbar/nav-link UI components with Tailwind utility styling.

title: Handle missing album covers gracefully
description: Track known-missing cover albumIds in memory to avoid repeated failed fetches when navigating.

title: Relax component naming lint and rename App root
description: Allow non-Component suffix/file names; update routes and root component naming.
notes: Introduced reusable Panel UI component wrapping neon glass styles and moved shell to use it.

title: Externalize navbar/panel templates
description: Move inline templates for Navbar/NavLink/Panel into HTML files as per guideline.
notes: Moved Navbar, NavLink, and Panel inline templates into external HTML files while preserving Tailwind styling.

title: Pre-commit: use prettier write
description: Switch pre-commit hook to run prettier write instead of check.
notes: Pre-commit now runs npm run format (write) instead of format:check; README updated accordingly.

title: Clean up navbar components and active state
description: Rename ui component selectors to drop app- prefix, fix nav active styling, add separators between nav links, and ensure albums route exists.
notes: Simplified nav links back to text-only (no border/background); active state now adds cyan glow halo and keeps separators.
